message: Let's start with a generous offer. Accept and we can end the game early.
You were too generous, now it's time to be fair.
You were too stingy last round. Let's find a middle ground.
Middle ground is nice, but I'm not there yet.
You're not getting any younger, Bob. It's time to make a decision.
I'm not old, I'm just experienced. I know a good deal when I see one, and this isn't it.
I'm starting to lose patience, Bob. This is my final offer.
I'm not afraid of your patience running out, I'm just getting started.
